import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { NumofpeopleContext } from '../../NumofpeopleContext' import Calendar from 'react-calendar' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import format from 'date-fns/format' import './hotelssection.css' import { useState } from 'react' const Hotelssection = (props) => { const [numofpeople,setNumofpeople] = useContext(NumofpeopleContext) const [hotels,setHotels] = useState([]) const [range,setRange] = useState(0) const [checkin, setCheckin] = useState(new Date()); const [checkout, setCheckout] = useState(new Date()); const [openCalendar,setOpenCalendar] = useState(false) const [opensdCalendar,setOpensdCalendar] = useState(false) if (openCalendar == true && opensdCalendar == true){ setOpenCalendar(false) setOpensdCalendar(false) } const getDefaultHotels = async () => { const gethotels = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/hotels'); const data = await gethotels.json() setHotels(data) } let filterNumofPeople = hotels.filter(each => each.numofpeople >= parseInt(numofpeople)) useEffect(() => { getDefaultHotels() },[]) console.log(typeof(range)) const {t,i18n} = props return ( <>

{t('hotelsearch.1')}

{t('home.1')}

/

{t('hotelsearch.1')}

{t('default.1')}

{t('low.1')}

{t('high.1')}

{filterNumofPeople.map(hotel => { return(

{hotel.title}

{t('shortdesc.1')}

{t('starting.1')} {hotel.price}$

{t('details.1')}

) })}

{t('reservation.1')}

{t('starting.1')} {range}$

{setRange(e.target.value)}} /> {openCalendar && } setOpenCalendar(!openCalendar)} onChange={setCheckin} value={format(checkin,'yyyy-MM-dd')} />
setOpensdCalendar(!opensdCalendar) } />
) } export default Hotelssection
